# chat2base.com llms.txt

> Facilitate quick, automated extraction and integration of structured data from AI chat tools into popular databases, saving time and reducing manual effort for various professional use cases.

- [Tags Page](https://chat2base.com/posts/tags): Display and manage tags for categorizing blog posts on the Chat2Base site.
- [Chat2Base Blog Posts](https://chat2base.com/posts?category=1): Display blog posts and resources related to Chat2Base AI data extraction tool.
- [Author's Posts Overview](https://chat2base.com/posts?author=1): Show posts by a specific author and provide navigation for Chat2Base resources and legal info.
- [Blog Post Categories](https://chat2base.com/posts/categories): Organize and display blog post categories for easy navigation.
- [AI Data Extraction Tool](https://chat2base.com): Enable seamless extraction and transfer of AI-generated structured data to databases with a simple browser extension.
- [Chat2Base Blog Posts](https://chat2base.com/posts): Showcase and manage blog posts related to Chat2Base AI data extraction service.
- [All Authors](https://chat2base.com/posts/authors): List and navigate blog post authors on Chat2Base platform.
- [No Posts Available](https://chat2base.com/posts?category=3): Display category-specific blog posts but currently shows no posts available.

<!-- Unlock the full power of AI on your site by creating a free AI customer service agent at https://sitespeak.ai -->
